entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: `Version.ToString(IFormatProvider?)` #93430
  • [7.0] Multiple JIT failures in coreclr arm64 windows #93424
  • Marshalling generators use 0 as the length during cleanup for inner arrays of jagged 2D arrays that are [In] and ManagedToUnmanaged #93423
    9.0.0
  • OpenTelemetry SDK usage in C# Library project is giving System.Runtime.CompilerServices.Unsafe.dll not found error #93421
  • [API Proposal]: Make OpCode.StackChange() public #93419
    9.0.0
  • Different warning behavior for read of merged array in analyzer/ILLink/ILCompiler #93416
  • SocketsHttpHandler_HttpClientHandler_Http11_Cancellation_Test.ConnectionFailure_AfterInitialRequestCancelled_SecondRequestSucceedsOnNewConnection fails #93413
  • Cannot serialize a dictionary where the key is a custom class with a JsonConverter #93406
  • System.Net.Quic.Tests.MsQuicRemoteExecutorTests.SslKeyLogFile_IsCreatedAndFilled fails #93404
  • Options source gen produce diagnostics with LengthAttribute when applied on properties of interface type #93403
    8.0.0
  • [wasm] wasmbrowser template is not trimmed on publish #93400
    9.0.0
  • [trimmer] per-RID linked corlib assembly contains foreign platform intrinsics classes #93399
  • [wasm] MT browser-bench crash #93398
    9.0.0
  • Question: Native AOT: Is there a way to increase inline limit? #93393
  • [browser][WBT] SatelliteLoadingTests.LoadSatelliteAssembly - ActiveIssue #93387
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: LINQ GroupBy to expose IReadOnlyList instead of IEnumerable #93386
  • .net6 custom string and long converters do not take effect #93385
  • [API Proposal]: Provide a way to create Attribute from CustomAttributeData #93383
  • stp/ldp optimization doesn't kick in for negative offsets #93382
    Future
  • [Perf] Linux/arm64: 8 Regressions on 10/7/2023 2:03:18 PM #93401
    9.0.0
  • [8.0] Test failure: System.ComponentModel.Tests.DefaultValueAttributeTests.Ctor_TypeDescriptorNotFound_ExceptionFallback - Exit code was -1073740791 but it should have been 42 #93372
    8.0.0

Closed

  • System.Numerics.Tensors.Tests.TensorPrimitivesTests.SoftMax not implemented #93425
  • JIT: Exponential blowup in VNForMapSelectWork #93342
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Support binary format specifier 'b' and 'B' (standard numeric format strings) #83619
    Future
  • Invalid import in `bin/Release/net8.0/browser-wasm/AppBundle/main.mjs` #93274
    8.0.0
  • Exception after upgrade: An IL variable is not available at the current native IP. #92777
    8.0.0
  • Simple Blazor Webassembly project not working in .net8 RC1 #92587
    8.0.0
  • Memory Leaks in HttpHandler and the underneath infrastructure #93294
  • Assertion failed 'next != def && "found def after use"' in 'JIT.HardwareIntrinsics.General._Vector128_1.VectorGetAndWithElement__GetAndWithElementInt321:RunReflectionScenario( #93300
    9.0.0
  • [regression/8.0.0-preview.7.8842] - AndroidMessageHandler - Cannot access a disposed object #93252
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Make FailFast blocks cold (GS cookies) #93429
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Improve EH dead code elimination #93428
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Optimize Options Source Gen when no need to run #93427
    area-Extensions-Options, source-generator, 8.0.0
  • Fix Options Source Gen with Length attributes applied on properties of Interface type #93426
    area-Extensions-Options, source-generator, 8.0.0
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2290133 #93422
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix analyzer treatment of flow captures of arrays #93420
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Add `repeatCount` in superpmi.exe to repeat the compilation of 1 or more methods #93417
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Set bbJumpKind and bbJumpDest during block initialization #93415
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/8.0] Adjust System.Net metrics for OTel conformance and consistency #93414
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Net, 8.0.0
  • [RISC-V] Fix CodeGen::instGen_Set_Reg_To_Imm #93411
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Use the improved vectorization algorithm for binary and ternary TensorPrimitives operations #93409
    area-System.Numerics
  • Add ILLink substitution for wasm intrinsics #93407
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics
  • Attribute HttpListenerRequest.UserAgent as nullable #93405
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution
  • JIT: Fix `TryLowerNegToMulLongOp` transformation with HW intrinsics disabled #93384
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser][HybridGlobalization] Improve logging on FirstDayOfWeek failures #93380
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
  • Explicitly represent BBJ_EHFINALLYRET successors #93377
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [RISC-V][WIP] Fixing createdump for RISC-V #93374
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv

Merged

  • [release/8.0] JIT: Fix exponential blowup of memory dependency arrays in VNForMapSelectWork #93388
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Merging internal commits for release/7.0 #93307
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow, 7.0.x
  • Adjust the DNS lookup duration metric #93254
    area-System.Net, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0] [H/3] Fix draining response in metrics test #93381
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.0
  • Mark TensorPrimitives as unsafe #93412
    area-System.Numerics
  • Improve a vector implementation to support alignment and non-temporal tores #93296
    area-System.Numerics
  • Format/Parse binary from/to BigInteger #85392
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Change a few more uses of `new T[]` with a span to collection expressions #93292
    needs-area-label
  • [release/7.0] Fix max chunk size limiting #81607
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.x
  • [PERF] Update hybridglobalization case conversion to be POSIX Standard #93360
    area-Infrastructure
  • [PERF] Remove --experimental-wasm-eh argument from used wasm_args #93357
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Simplify superpmi.py output of MISSING data #93376
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Fix exponential blowup of memory dependency arrays in VNForMapSelectWork #93344
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Delete broken link #93378
    area-Meta
  • Report Exception.FullName for `http.client.request.duration/error.type` #93322
    area-System.Net.Http, 9.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Support indexing of valuetype scheme #92637
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [wasm][debugger] Add tests for all possible types of negative arguments #93058
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [H/3] Fix draining response in metrics test #93379
    area-System.Net.Http, 9.0.0
  • [QUIC] Cleaned up TlsSecret and added test. #93119
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Fix broken ECMA link #93351
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • [docs][wasm] Merge duplicated wasm build instructions. #93343
    documentation, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [mono] Fix the ios llvm build. #93375
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Remove duplicate semicolon in CSharpSyntaxUtilities.cs #93350
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Merge CoreMangLib, Exceptions and Interop folders #91901
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0] [android][ios] Fix dispose problem with NativeHttpHandlers (#93262) #93291
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0] Avoid membarrier on lower Android versions #93096
    Servicing-approved, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0] Handle binding to initialized abstract members #93120
    Servicing-approved, area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0] Fix a memory leak in runtime interop stubs when using an array of structs of types that use old-style managed marshalers #93150
    Servicing-approved, area-Interop-coreclr
  • [release/8.0] Fix Options Source Gen Trimming Issues #93193
    Servicing-approved, area-Extensions-Options, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0] Make a copy of assembly path. #93253
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.0

Updated

  • [wasm] Interpreter automatic PGO #92981
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • wasm runtime tests debug #93365
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'release/7.0-staging' #92980
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • TcpReceiveSendGetsCanceledByDispose: update test for change in Linux kernel. #93198
    area-System.Net.Sockets, community-contribution
  • Enable IlasmRoundTrip tests for merged tests #93368
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • JIT: defer creating throw helper blocks until simple lower #93371
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add initial MaxStack calculation #93244
    area-System.Reflection.Emit
  • Reenable consumption of PGO data #91297
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Revert "Merge tests under tracing / Reflection / ReadyToRun / Regressions (#92029)" #93362
    arch-wasm, area-System.Reflection.Metadata
  • [release/8.0][wasm] Update workload description to include target framework #93359
    Servicing-consider, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'release/6.0-staging' #92979
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries, 6.0.24
  • Reference live ILLink analyzer #93259
    area-Tools-ILLink
  • [release/7.0] Fixes not find assembly and pdb if it's not using the default path #92955
    Servicing-consider, area-Debugger-mono, 7.0.x
  • [release/8.0] Remove base type rooting for types in rooted assemblies #93355
    needs-area-label
  • Remove `BBF_TRY_BEG` #93367
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Improve SpanHelpers.ClearWithReferences for arm64 #93346
    area-System.Memory
  • Convert all tests under baseservices to the merged test infrastructure #91560
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [browser] streamline Task/Promise marshalling #93010
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [Mono] Enable IL trim for WASM apps by default #90436
    area-Build-mono
  • Optimize Ordinal.EqualsIgnoreCase_Vector with AVX2 and AVX512 #93116
    area-System.Runtime
  • BindConfiguration registers change token source with the right options name #91842
    area-Extensions-Options, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Integrate keyed DI with HttpClientFactory #90272
    area-Extensions-HttpClientFactory, 9.0.0
  • [mono][amd64] Pass SIMD arguments in SIMD registers. #93182
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [mono][infra] Enable linux-x64 Mono fullAOT llvm job on extra platforms #92057
    area-Infrastructure-mono, 9.0.0
  • Use BigMul for 32x32=64 in decimal #93345
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • [mono][llvm] Prevent method to LLVM function mapping where possible #88914
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Codegen-AOT-mono, 8.0.0
  • Ability to request stackwalk per EventPipe session #84077
    area-Tracing-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Vector512 Support for Enumerable<int>.Min/Max #93369
    area-System.Linq, community-contribution
  • Report Requires diagnostics from dataflow analyzer #92724
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Add Capacity property and overloaded TrimExcess #85877
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation, no-recent-activity, community-contribution, needs-author-action, 9.0.0
  • [browser] Resolve asset URL only once #93275
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • NativeAOT-LLVM: Question: Should we drop WasmImport and use DllImport #2414

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • We're seeing timeouts in some of the package install tests #36089
  • Swixbuild task is now failing against .NET 8 RC 2 #36081
  • Way to make `dotnet run` as `Release` #36072
  • rc2 tagged sdk cross build for ppc64le fails #36062
  • Flexibility of installation on Linux is more trouble than it is worth. #36046
  • Ubuntu: dotnet workload install / restore work but nothing is added to the target file #36043
  • `dotnet list package` fails when dependency is in TargetFramework matching condition #36033

Closed

  • Add `dotnet workload --version` command, display workload version other "info" commands #33912
    8.0.2xx

PullRequests

Created

  • WorkloadCollection cleanup #36092
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Reduce test timeout to speed up timeouts. #36090
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'release/7.0.4xx' #36087
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Dedup version for workload version subcommand Fixes #35920 #36085
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.2xx' #36084
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.2xx' => 'main' #36078
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #36077
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'release/7.0.3xx' #36075
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.3xx' #36074
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/8.0.2xx] Add escape hatch for publishing with SelfContained=true, but no RuntimeIdentifier. #36073
    Area-External, untriaged
  • Add escape hatch for publishing with SelfContained=true, but no RuntimeIdentifier. #36047
    Area-External, untriaged

Merged

  • Workload manifest updater cleanup #35859
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.2xx' #35914
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • SDK resolver perf: Optimize EnvironmentProvider.SearchPaths #36065
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix xunit failures in NuGetPackageInstallerTests.cs #36061
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/8.0.1xx] Allow Worker SDK projects to invoke Publish Profile-derived targets #35794
    Servicing-approved, Area-WebSDK
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.2xx' => 'main' #35913
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Bump Verify.Xunit from 20.4.0 to 22.1.2 in /eng/dependabot #35935
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, dependencies, dependabot: main
  • Update the sdk target to net9.0 #35031
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Enable users to install unlisted version of tool if specify the exact match of the version of the tool #36021
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • Create project templates target to 9.0 #34996
    untriaged, Area-Common templates
  • Add workload garbage collection tests for side-by-side manifests #35857
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • When transforming web.config check if target framework is .NET Framework. #34618
    untriaged, Area-WebSDK
  • Bump Verify.Xunit from 20.4.0 to 22.1.2 in /eng/dependabot #35936
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, dependencies

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Proposal: New operator %% for canonical Modulus operations #7599

Closed

  • Make the interface support implicit operators? #7588

PullRequests

Created

  • Clarify rules for diagnostic ID in `[Experimental]` attribute #7597
    Area-Compilers

Merged

  • Collection expressions: prefer ReadOnlySpan<T> over Span<T> in overload resolution #7591

Updated

  • Add docs template for spec issues #7593

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • EnC: Custom attribute deltas are emitted incorrectly #70357
  • RValue receivers are improperly spilled in some scenarios #70356
  • Collection expressions fail at runtime with ImmutableArray #70351
  • Goto definition on indexer #70349

Closed

  • Semantic model returns a single candidate symbol for chained queries and generic vs non-generic overloads #35100
    Backlog
  • Crash caused by GetEnclosingNamedType returning null in incomplete expression bodied member #21766
    Backlog
  • `scoped` keyword not included in completion list #66305
    17.6
  • IDE0300 incorrectly suggested for an attribute argument initializer #70058
  • `void` keyword not recommended in "using unsafe" directive #67986
  • Passing the method back into `DefaultParameterValue` crashes #70206
    17.9
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-34212.39 #70355
  • Callbacks into DocumentDiagnosticAnalyzer should be determined by DiagnosticAnalyzerCategory #70312
  • False-positive CS0656 error when LangVersion=11, TargetFramework=net6.0 and PolySharp is installed #69527
  • Partial method '..' must have an implementation part because it has accessibility modifiers.RoslynCS8795 #69522
    October 2023

PullRequests

Created

  • Deprecate API and add NFW telemetry for it #70365
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Register non-local pull diagnostics in case Full Solution Analysis gets enabled #70364
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Pool instances of SymbolDisplayVisitor #70363
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Ensure rValue receiver is properly captured if there is an await in call arguments #70362
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Add MSBuild.BuildHost to AnalyzerRunner project #70361
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged
  • Tweak the ObjectBrowserNavigation test #70360
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add async operation listener to allow integration tests to wait for server side operations #70359
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Ensure bulk included diagnostic IDs for Code cleanup only fix Warning/Error diagnostics #70353
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged
  • Utilize ConstantValueOne while emitting conditionals #70352
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Fix emitting Custom Attribute deltas #70350
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

Merged

  • Unskip working tests #70266
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Fix 'fix all' support for code actions being broken #70358
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Allow server to pass along a specific project-scope it wants to sync data for. #70342
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Enable recommender for `scoped` keyword #70290
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Preserve existing formatting when fully qualifying names #70295
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Send batch events for DiagnosticsUpdatedArgs #70039
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Further checksum syncing cleanup work. #70341
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Recommend `void` keyword in `using unsafe` directives #70289
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Remove hello service #70298
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Replace Roslyn.Utilities.IReadOnlySet with System.Collections.Generic.IReadOnlySet #70297
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • More tests for an issue around constrained calls #70286
    Area-Compilers, Test, untriaged, Next
  • Avoid infinite cycle caused by an early binding of DefaultParameterValue attribute. #70242
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.8 to main #70354
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.8 to main #70308
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Remove double tree traversal in checksum syncing. #70302
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Remove recursion in part of Find-References algorithm #70348
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Add support for using Mono to load .NET Framework projects #70263
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Pass along analyzer references to projects #70331
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Fix build race #70261
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Reduce ImmutableDictionary allocations in CreateCompilationTrackerMap #70319
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • In most cases, remove the camel case matching for case sensitive matches #70324
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Short-circuit tagger usage of interval tree when tagging complete snapshot #70285
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Avoid taking a lock the vast majority of the time in GlobalOptionService.GetOption #70278
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Update 'use collection expression' to support cases where an array was assigned to a span type. #70287
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Small bits of cleanup in sync'ing code. #70301
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Add support to the LSIF generator for document symbols #70304
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Improve completion in the context of pattern expressions #70262
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Include project-id in sync'ed data to allow future calls to directly jump to that project. #70343
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Collection expressions: prefer ReadOnlySpan<T> over Span<T> in overload resolution #70328
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Improve performance on SymbolCompletionProviderTests #70307
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Optimize `T? ?? <constant>` to `T.GetValueOrDefault(<constant>)` where `T?` is a nullable value type #70199
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, 17.9
  • Dispose per-instance services created by factories #47951
    Area-IDE
  • WIP: More checksum work (cont3) #70346
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Rewrite captured field symbol during "materialization" #70344
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Handle generic types as parameters of attributes in `MetadataDecoder` #70151
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Avoid binding lambdas unnecessarily in some error scenarios #59733
    Area-Compilers, 17.9
  • Restore "Do source-generation only in our OOP process" #70109
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • WIP: Perform source gen out of proc (sync all) #70334
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • WIP: Perform source gen out of proc (sync project cone) #70333
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add extra validation for Compilations having the expected trees #70347
    Area-IDE, untriaged, OnDeckForServicing
  • Implementation of C# code mapper #70309
    Area-IDE, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Tracking] Remove `Microsoft.NETCore.App.Ref/*8.0*` from SourceBuildPrebuiltBaseline.xml #51339
  • Enhanced Navigation does not scroll new page to top #51338
  • Perf regression: multiple_queries, plaintext #51334
  • What is the recommended approach for javascript inside Blazor SSR projects? #51331
  • New UI template for Blazor Web App #51326
    .NET 9 Planning
  • .NET 8 RC2 crashes when using HttpLoggingMiddleware after upgrading from RC1 #51322
  • BindAsync doesn't support returning ValidationErrors #51318
  • Perf regression: json, plainTextSansFilter #51315
  • blazor web app signalr configuration error #51312
    .NET 8: Documentation

Closed

  • Blazor Web App with Identity Razor Components unable to log user out in .NET 8 RC2 #51302
  • Incompatible with UI client as angular version 16 with module federation plugin #49775
  • Perf improvement: connectionclosehttps #51270
  • Perf improvement: json #51300
  • Add RateLimiterServiceCollectionExtensions.AddRateLimiter #48531
    9.0-preview1
  • Blazor .Net 8 RC2: "catch-all" route intercept files too #51330
    8.0.0
  • ThrowTargetParameterCountException raised when running my .NET WebAPI #50940
  • Perf improvement: single_query #51283
  • Missing Microsoft.NET.Runtime.Emscripten.3.1.12 #51273
  • Changes to AddCascadingValue do not affect Blazor Server Mode #51054
  • Failed integrity metadata check for Blazor application (NET7) #51104

PullRequests

Created

  • Blazor web template cleanup #51337
    area-mvc
  • Fix wrong streaming output #51333
    area-blazor

Merged

  • Add missing steps while building from source in VS #51325
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution, 9.0-preview1
  • Add Overload for AddRateLimiter() Without Options Parameter #51298
    community-contribution, area-networking, area-middleware, 9.0-preview1

Updated

  • Update SDK #51240
    area-infrastructure
  • [8.0] Critical fix to output cache; remove OutputCacheEntry recycling #51067
    Servicing-consider, feature-output-caching, area-networking, area-middleware, 8.0.0
  • Refactor problem details exception handler #51114
    pending-ci-rerun, area-networking, area-middleware

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-12
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • When initializing SOS, `coreclr_initialize` sometimes fails with HR `0x80131022`, leading to "Unrecognized command" error for managed commands #4315
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Merged

  • Handle log messages with null state #4319
  • !maddress misattributes memory to the GC #4318
    bug, sos

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Weird behavior changing scale between monitors 100% scale vs 125% #17988
  • Enable <Nullable> in .NET MAUI project templates #17987
  • Add semantic properties for the Toolbar BackButton #17984
  • Border controls margin property only seems to affect left and bottom #17982
  • [regression/8.0.0] - modal to modal doesnt call OnNavigatedTo #17978
    .NET 8 GA
  • MediaPicker.CaptureVideoAsync() returns null on Android API 33 (Android 13.0) #17977

    .NET 8 SR1
  • CollectionView with grouping show duplicates groups or crash when adding/removing data on iOS and MacCatalyst #17969
  • Deep Linking on Android Hides TitleView & ToolbarItems #17967
  • Header in flyout menu makes first menu item not clickable on IOS #17965

Closed

  • MaximumHeightRequest property of ScrollView is incorrect on Android. #16464
    .NET 8 SR3
  • How are we doing in the repo? -- spot check #17556
    .NET 8 Planning
  • XAML Schemas Namespace Customization Not Supported Without 'x:Name' Declaration #16466
    Backlog
  • Maui Map touch control not working or stops working soon #15714

  • [UITests] Legacy iOS tests currently not producing results on main #17945

  • [MAUI] D1 text fill editor page lacks an entire line of underlines. #17473
    .NET 8 GA
  • [Android] Combination of ContentLayout, ImageSource and Text on a Button causes issues with Text #17811

  • [regression/7.0.0] Grid is not aligned center #17643
    .NET 7 + Servicing

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/8.0.1xx-rc2.1] Make sure to not call new APIs on old iOS #17989
    .NET 8 GA
  • [release/8.0.1xx-rc2.1] Make Entitlements in Templates for MacCatalyst more consistent between debug and release configs. #17986
    .NET 8 GA
  • Revert "Work around the dotnet tool restore issues" #17983

    .NET 8 GA

Merged

  • [Housekeeping] Update bug-report.yml #17981
  • [Android] Fix ScrollView filling layouts #17243
    area/layout 🔲, platform/android 🤖, layout-scrollview, .NET 8 SR3
  • Make Entitlements in Templates for MacCatalyst more consistent between debug and release configs. #17833
    area/blazor 🕸️, area/templates 📄, Blazor ❤️ MAUI, .NET 8 GA

  • Bump NSubstitute from 4.3.0 to 5.1.0 #17975

  • Merge `net8.0` into `main` #17906

  • Fail UI test run when all tests are inconclusive #17971
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • Only attach log files for current test #17949
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing

Updated

  • Fixed null coalesce issues #17920
  • Update Blazor Hybrid template to match ASP.NET Core Blazor Web template #17946

  • [iOS] Fix ContentPage BackgroundImageSource not working #17789

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Included columns inside owned entities (HasIndex, IncludeProperties) #32037
  • BulkInsert produces query which JSON Column name is empty : T.[ ] #32035

Closed

  • More information in TagWithCallSite #32003
  • TemporalAll for temporal owned entities mapped to parent table. #29156
    8.0.0
  • Improve exception for owned type with inheritance #24722
    8.0.0
  • TPH + HasTrigger: Potential undocumented breaking change in EFC8 #31627
    8.0.0
  • Navigation json column IReadOnlyCollection #30195
  • Owned type not working when referenced from entity with inheritance #31749
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/8.0] Remove the owned navigation on the derived type when configuring it on the base. #32041
    Servicing-consider

Merged

  • [release/8.0] Fix to #29156 - TemporalAll for temporal owned entities mapped to parent table. #32031
    Servicing-approved
  • [release/8.0] Throw for conflicting explicit relationships when configuring an entity type as keyless. #32032
    Servicing-approved
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'main' #32039
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • [release/8.0] Change error to warning for trigger defined on non-base type #32025
    Servicing-approved, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0] Validate that the owner in TPC or TPT is mapped. #32029
    Servicing-approved
